Get WebElements
kw.doc: Returns a list of WebElement objects matching the ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Get WebElement
kw.doc: Returns the first WebElement matching the given ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.doc: Returns the first WebElement matching the given ``locator``.
